name: TypeScript
contents:
• Strongly Typed ğŸ”’: TypeScript is a statically typed superset of JavaScript, providing optional types.

    typescript

     

    Copy code

    let isDone: boolean = false;

  • Interfaces ğŸ“œ: Define complex types and enforce structure in objects.

    typescript

     

    Copy code

    interface Person {  firstName: string;  lastName: string;}

  • Classes ğŸ—ï¸: Create custom types with properties and methods.

    typescript

     

    Copy code

    class Animal {  name: string;  constructor(name: string) { this.name = name; }  makeSound() { console.log('Some sound'); }}

  • Generics ğŸ§±: Allows writing reusable and flexible code.

    typescript

     

    Copy code

    function identity<T>(arg: T): T { return arg; }

  • Type Inference ï¿½ï¿½educated: TypeScript can infer the type based on the value.

    typescript

     

    Copy code

    let message = 'Hello World'; // message is of type string
